episodes.title: Public Hearing for Inquiry into Cults
episodes.description:
Directors of the Olive Leaf Network, Mirriam Francis and Maria Esguerra attend public hearing at Parliament House for government inquiry into cults, 5th November 2025.

In 2025, the Parliament of Victoria in Australia announced an inquiry into cults and organised fringe groups, to examine the methods used to recruit and control members and the impacts of coercive control. The Committee will report its findings and recommendations by 30 September 2026.
